price: Anã kẽwayãwa a kansu da akussa na zĩnãriya da kõfuna, alhãli kuwa a cikinsu akwai abin da rãyuka ke marmari kuma idãnu su ji dãɗi, kuma kũ, a cikinta (Aljannar), madawwama ne.
arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِصِحَافٖ مِّن ذَهَبٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيهِ ٱلۡأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنُۖ وَأَنتُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
